vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Neh.10.6; also called Ginnethoi (KJV: Ginnetho) at Neh.12.4;
§ Ginnetho or Ginnethon = "gardener"
a priest among the exiles who returned with Zerubbabel and who covenanted with Nehemiah
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
近頓 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "園丁"
一個與尼希米立約的祭司，跟隨所羅巴伯被擄歸回。
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
近顿 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "园丁"
一个与尼希米立约的祭司，跟随所罗巴伯被掳归回。
